summary: The state of Texas is divided into 254 counties.
full_text:
Henry Wax Karnes  was notable as a soldier and figure of the Texas Revolution, as well as the commander of General Sam Houston's "Spy Squad" at the Battle of San Jacinto.
Both Karnes County and Karnes City, its county seat, are named after him.
^ Gannett, Henry . The Origin of Certain Place Names in the United States. Govt. Print. Off. p. 172.
title: Henry Karnes
